0.1.11.text: A remorse timer now prevents you from disconnection from Facebook if you triggered the action by error.
When Friends is updated, a list of new features and bugfixes is now displayed.
It is possible to open photos and albums from news feed.
The pulley menus in news feed page and user page now glow when feeds are loading.
Section separator in friends page are now displayed correctly.
Improved images handling. There should be less freezes.
